name: Pastry Game
description:
Your grandmother was always a bit mysterious. When she disappeared one day without a trace, all you could find amongst her things were a note and a map. Now it's time to reclaim her legacy of baked goods, and solve the mystery surrounding her disappearance. Are you ready for the adventure of a lifetime?

Also I made this game in 9 days and streamed the whole process on Twitch 👉👈
We have Discord to chat about the game btw
